title: Big Night In
info: Big Night In provides a user with movie recommendations, along with a local pizza recommendation.

title: README Generator
info: Command Line Application - uses Node.js to generate professional README documentation from command line inputs.

title: React Portfolio
info: My personal web development portfolio site.  Built using React and Bootstrap 5.

title: Weather Dashboard
info: Provides a 5 day weather forecast for a searched city.  A search history is provided by utilising local storage.

title: Password Generator
info: JS Application which with create a pseudo-random password, with customisable options

title: Team Profile Generator
info: Command Line Application - uses Node.js to collect information regarding a team and then renders a webpage
